Update to state estimate based upon received sensor measurements

Parameters:

propagate_model(measurement: MsgSensors) → None¶

Model propagation between measurements Propagates the state model between measurements using a model replacement technique

Parameters:

measurement – gyro and accelerometer measurements needed for model propagation

Parameters:

  • measurement – current sensor measurements
